The Big Adventure RPG! Inotia3: Children of Carnia!âââ This game supports English, franÃ§ais, Deutsch, íê¸, ä¸­æ and æ¥æ¬èª. âââAn inevitable fate lies before the children of Carnia. The greatest epic adventure RPG by far! The Chronicles of Inotia 3! The new legend is about to begin in the continent of Inotia."With the coming of age ritual ahead, Lucio and Ameli from Carnia village happen to be acquiring guntlets, and the adventure stirred up by these guntlets leads to a consequence that is a way beyond their imaginations against monsters... Lucio and Ameli realize soon that they have extraordinary destinies lain before them... Warriors' fates have been predestined for thousands of years already... Will those who are born to be warriors be happy after all?"â Features â1) Organized Party System A Party Battle System, where you get to combine 6 classes to construct your own party! You can control each character separately and enhance their skills and stats however you like. Through a story mode, you can not only obtain various characters, but also hire mercenaries with items. Personalize each character by equipping a variety of clothing, weapons and defense weapons.2) Touching Story on an Enormous Scale Far better and more enormous in scale than its predecessor, the story line of Inotia III is constructed in such detail that you wonât be able to take your eyes off the game. reviews.title: The game is very good..... Keep it up
reviews.comment: Good an fantastic adventure game...best game ever
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Very easy game,very soft touch,very very good game,i wish more games like this for galaxy y cp.love this game so much
reviews.author: Jacky Cain

reviews.title: Great game.  Am really enjoy the story as well as the game play
reviews.comment: Good game, fun and entertaining
reviews.author: Sean Hessler

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.comment: Nice graphics, cool combat, and nice customization! Good stuff!
reviews.author: JT Sukeforth

reviews.title: This game is excellent.
reviews.comment: Smooth play, fun adventures, a well thought out game.mad props to the designer\'s..
reviews.author: Joseph PUNCH

reviews.title: Inotia 3 - great game!
reviews.comment: This is a great action rpg and even runs like a dream on my crappy Galaxy Y!
reviews.author: Mark Flint

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It\'s a good RPG one of the few that actually work and easy to play with a good story line I would definitely recommend it
reviews.author: Fadhil Brander

reviews.title: The most amazing game ever
reviews.comment: This is the only game I Truly enjoy. The style is amazing and I wish they would make more. Like legend of the dragoons or final fantasy x those are the best kind
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Delightful
reviews.comment: The touch controls are really responsive, and the character moves fluidly.  The character pictures are appealing, and the game is easy enough to figure out without the use of a tutorial.
reviews.author: Victoria Meierhoff

reviews.title: awsome!!
reviews.comment: i really really really love this game!! promise,its one of the best game i had played...ever...its like the game aveyond where you can also upgrade your characters...its so good!if only i can give a hundred stars,i would!!  its a must have game...and im sure you will also like it..,great job!
reviews.author: Dianne Regalario

reviews.title: Nice but lil bit hard
reviews.comment: A nice game to add on your android/iphone. Thought its a lil bit hard of leveling here. Overall its a nice and great game. Looking for inotia 5
reviews.author: Stephen Chandra

reviews.title: Throwback
reviews.comment: It looks like old PS1 rpgs, but the combat is real time. Fun so far but I just started. Interested to see how party management is set up.
reviews.author: Joseph Johnston

reviews.title: Awesomeness!!
reviews.comment: This game is one of the best I\'ve ever played on my phone!! Thanks so much for creating it!! Though a storage area or more space in our bags would be nice.
reviews.author: Celine Chin

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: Id like a bit more fluidity and maybe less walking on a grid, but so far its been enjoyable. I wong be pur purchasing anything with real money though. Id rather pay a couple bucks after playing a demo in order to upgrade to the full version than get nickel and dimed.
reviews.author: Joshua Rooks

reviews.title: Cool RPG
reviews.comment: Nice storyline, good graphic, and cool character customization. I luv it  :)
reviews.author: Jansabar Sianturi

reviews.title: Excellent Throwback to Adventure Games of Yore
reviews.comment: I feel like I\'m playing a most excellent blend of Legend of Zelda, Final Fantasy, and any Golden Sun-like title from the GBA. It`s f2p to boot! Give it a go. You\'ve got nothing to lose, save 10? minutes of your time.
reviews.author: Chris Gresham

reviews.title: Welcome back zelda.
reviews.comment: What a wonderful game. It seemlessly combines elements from both zelda and final fantasy games into one nice package with a great soundtrack.
reviews.author: Robert Foxgrover

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This is the most addictive and entertaining free game I have ever played. Hours upon hours of fun. Well done!
reviews.author: Sarah Byrd

reviews.title: Surprizingly addicting
reviews.comment: This game caught my eye when I saw it, and I didn\'t think much of it until I tried it.  But I see now why it won the awards!  Great for both plot and gameplay!  Also, for such a good looking game, it\'s very easy on the battery life.
reviews.author: Braxton Istace

reviews.title: Way to many ads
reviews.comment: Great game so far then again I\'ve only gotten to the first town so can\'t say much so far my biggest complaint is the ads I need to close each time I change location and so far I can\'t find a remove ads purchase which I would do. If I find that I will probably upgrade to 5 stars I know free needs ads but give the option to pay to remove them.
reviews.author: Clifton Choiniere
